newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: South Korea seizes two Chinese fishing boats.
newsitem.headline: South Korea seizes two Chinese fishing boats.

text.p: South Korean maritime police said on Thursday they seized two Chinese trawlers for fishing inside South Korea's territorial waters.
"Two Chinese fishing boats were found fishing in our territorial waters this morning. They will be towed to the Inchon port tomorrow morning for investigation," a police officer said by telephone.
He said the two 60 ton boats, with 23 crew on board, were caught fishing half a mile inside South Korean waters off the country's second largest port city of Inchon.
Police said the incident brings to eight the number of Chinese trawlers seized by South Korea for violating its territorial waters this year.
